Description

Atom feed class

Methods

__get, getDOM, getGenerator, getIcon, getSubtitle, getlogo, setGenerator, setHttpClient, setIcon, setService, setSubtitle, setlogo, takeChildFromDOM,

__get( string   $var, ) : mixed

Description

Make accessing some individual elements of the feed easier.

Special accessors 'entry' and 'entries' are provided so that if you wish to iterate over an Atom feed's entries, you can do so using foreach ($feed->entries as $entry) or foreach ($feed->entry as $entry).


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$var string | The property to access.

Return value

Type Description
mixed

$minorVersion n/a null

Return value

Type Description

setService( Zend_Gdata_App   $instance, ) : Zend_Gdata_App_FeedEntryParent

Description

Set the active service instance for this feed and all enclosed entries.

This will be used to perform network requests, such as when calling save() and delete().


Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$instance Zend_Gdata_App | The new service instance.

Return value

Type Description
Zend_Gdata_App_FeedEntryParent Provides a fluent interface.

takeChildFromDOM( DOMNode   $child, ) : n/a

Description

Creates individual Entry objects of the appropriate type and stores them in the $_entry array based upon DOM data.

Arguments

Name Type Description Default
$child DOMNode | The DOMNode to process

Return value

Type Description
n/a n/a
